title: Some arguments for ADC's
body:
This is a post in gameplay, so I don't expect it to go far.

This is also a post defending adc qq, so, see above statement.

We are all keenly aware of the {{item:3070}} "I'm an adc with no resist items and got 1-shot nerf now" meme, but there are some problems with this.

1. ADC scales the worst of any role, in both levels and gold. ADC scales almost exclusively with items, and even they scale poorly. In other words, a fed adc is worse than any other role, be that fed tank, bruiser, mage, or assassin (Talon excluded). 

2. ADC's have to build full glass or else they are worthless. There is no time that an adc can afford to buy a real defensive item. Lifesteal is the best thing they have access to because if you build a GA your damage goes to shit and you are useless. 

This is because most adc's need at least 3 items to teamfight. For example, when I play {{champion:29}} for example, I need {{item:3031}} {{item:3085}} and {{item:3036}} or else I wont be able to deal good damage because the other team will just build {{item:3047}}  and beat my rat-ass into the ground. Now, if the game gets to this point I actually can afford to buy some lifesteal and a GA, but as we all know this is an early game meta and 80% of the time I'm not going to get past 3 items.

Now, I can't afford to give up any of the 3 aforementioned items or else I will lose all of my damage. ADC's have no option to build damage and defensively at the same time, like all other lanes. 

Toplaners have {{item:3071}} {{item:3022}} and {{item:3068}} , midlaners have {{item:3157}} and  {{item:3001}}. What does botlane have? {{item:3156}}  and {{item:3139}}, neither of which are good choices as a first or second item, and neither of which give armor(I know that MF can build {{item:3071}} and {{item:3142}} but that's extremely niche)

TL:DR, ADC's are forced to go full glass in order to have enough damage to contribute to teamfights in levels equivalent to mages, fighters or bruisers, but unlike the latter classes have no way to take health or resistances along the way.

replies.body:
"A fed ADC is worth less than any other role"

What is this?  Amateur hour?  You gotta do better than that to make me laugh. 

Though off topic: have you ever thought about building bruiser as an ADC?

It does feel like that since you're depending on your team for _everything_.
Hell, some people are picking mages instead of ADCs for a reason. ADCs don't offer much besides damage, while mages do damage, have cc and most that go mid have burst, poke, some roaming potential, scale mostly of the base damage of their skills and can siege.
It literally feels that you can't do anything without your support.

lol only mage going bot is ziggs man

Because he can shove down a wave way earlier in the game than adc's can. Imagine when more people start bringing, say aurelion sol botlane with a hard CC support, crazy wave-clear and roaming potential, and is punished less for dying because he can just W back to lane

That's very on-topic actually. Bruiser ADC cannot and will not work because all ADC damage comes from flat AD with low base damages in abilities. Building bruiser means that you will not deal damage. 

Imagine having an adc with one item at 30 mins, that is the amount of damage bruiser adc's will deal, in exchange for 800 health

It's not bad, it's just finicky. 

But when your primary goal is to bring the teams DPS and melt any objective quickly. Then you can't really balance that, except as a finicky glass cannon. 

Yet in this case, their measurement is in raw DPS, not dueling power. Hence why they are finicky, and why they need the teams support. And I just laugh at the thought of people thinking that glass cannons should have the same dueling/skirmishing power. (Unless that ADC is like a Graves or something) 

If you can't stand getting support from your team, don't play ADC if your trying to climb the latter.
